body: @Br0ker @IMBACKJROCK111 there assets are minimal every time investor is comparing to TSM. $TSM  has over $140 billion in cash and assets liquidity. Ok $AMD doesnt even come close. They actually diluted there shares with XlNX at $50 billion. There top end is $21 billion in sales for the year. They are not growing that fast either plus we don’t even know what there numbers are. If you read tsm earning report and compare the books you’ll see. The intrinsic value of $38. TSM covers every aspect in the chip segment more than $AMD so compare the two and tell me who’s paying top dollar for amd. The China Taiwan risk is the same for AMD as it is for TSM because AMD gets there chips from TSM they can’t buy from another manufacture because TSM is the king of chips and holds the best technology at the moment they supply $AAPL as well amongst others like Sony
$AAPL this should retrace before falling further. Let’s see how it unfolds when the market opens.

links.title: 12 Most Successful OTC Stocks and their Innovative Products from since 2000 - Issuer Consulting
links.description: OTC stocks are those traded over-the-counter. Some investors shy away from OTC stocks as buying and selling them requires paying a commission. Furthermore, OTC stocks are filled at specific bid prices, meaning investors must bid above the current trading price for their order to be filled.
